text: is a Japanese professional football club in the Shimizu ward of Shizuoka.Soccerway.com, "Shimizu S-Pulse"; retrieved 2012-3-5.Jsoccer.com, "Japan J.League Teams" ; retrieved 2012-7-5. The club plays in the J1 League. ==History== The club was founded in 1991. ==League position== *2011 : J1 League - 10th *2012 : J1 League - 9th *2013 : J1 League - 9th *2014 : J1 League - 15th *2015 : J1 League - 17th *2016 : J2 League - 2nd *2017 : J1 League - 14th *2018 : J1 League - 8th *2019 : J1 League - 12th *2020 : J1 League - 16th ===Former position=== ==Related pages == * Sports in Japan * List of Japanese football teams * List of Shimizu S-Pulse players * JÃºbilo Iwata == References == ==Other websites== * http://www.s-pulse.co.jp/english/index/ ; * J.League Club Guide Category:Football clubs in Shizuoka Prefecture Category:1991 establishments in Japan
